body_html: Thanks for the report. I don't think -1 size dimension was ever supposed to work in the Tensor constructor, and we'd prefer to give an error in this case. Should be easy enough for people to fix, if they notice it :)
body_text: Thanks for the report. I don't think -1 size dimension was ever supposed to work in the Tensor constructor, and we'd prefer to give an error in this case. Should be easy enough for people to fix, if they notice it :)
body: Thanks for the report. I don't think -1 size dimension was ever supposed to work in the Tensor constructor, and we'd prefer to give an error in this case. Should be easy enough for people to fix, if they notice it :)
